, 0 AS my_recomm_count , 0 AS my_clip_count
, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geo_reaction WHERE rxn_target_id=a.dest_id AND rxn_user_id=#destUserId# AND rxn_type='LIKE') AS my_recomm_count , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geo_clipboard WHERE clip_page_id=a.dest_id AND clip_user_id=#destUserId#) AS my_clip_count

ORDER BY dest_reg_datetime DESC, dest_id DESC LIMIT #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT dest_id , dest_title , dest_ad_slogan , dest_region , dest_category , dest_tag , dest_website_url , dest_img_path , dest_phone , dest_address , dest_axis_x , dest_axis_y , dest_information , dest_season , dest_feature , dest_description , dest_recomm_point , dest_clip_point , dest_writer , dest_reg_datetime , dest_hit
, 0 AS my_recomm_count , 0 AS my_clip_count
, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geo_reaction WHERE rxn_target_id=a.dest_id AND rxn_user_id=#destUserId# AND rxn_type='LIKE') AS my_recomm_count , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geo_clipboard WHERE clip_page_id=a.dest_id AND clip_user_id=#destUserId#) AS my_clip_count

ORDER BY dest_reg_datetime DESC, dest_id DESC LIMIT #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT DISTINCT dest_region AS destRegion FROM geo_destination WHERE dest_region IS NOT NULL AND dest_region <> '' ORDER BY dest_region

SELECT TA.* FROM ( SELECT dest_id AS destId , dest_title AS destTitle , dest_axis_x AS destAxisX , dest_axis_y AS destAxisY , dest_region AS destRegion , ST_DISTANCE(POINT(#destAxisX#, #destAxisY#), POINT(dest_axis_x, dest_axis_y)) * 111195 AS distance FROM geo_destination where 1=1 AND dest_region=#destRegion# AND dest_category=#destCategory# AND dest_axis_x is not null AND dest_axis_x <> '' AND dest_axis_x <> 0 AND dest_axis_y is not null AND dest_axis_y <> '' AND dest_axis_y <> 0 ORDER BY distance ) TA WHERE 1=1 and TA.distance > 0 and TA.distance <= #distance# ORDER BY TA.distance ASC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT dest_category, dest_tag FROM geo_destination WHERE dest_category IN
#searchCatList[]#
GROUP BY dest_category, dest_tag HAVING dest_tag IS NOT NULL

SELECT tbl2.dest_id , tbl2.dest_title , tbl2.dest_ad_slogan , tbl2.dest_region , tbl2.dest_category , tbl2.dest_tag , tbl2.dest_website_url , tbl2.dest_img_path , tbl2.dest_phone , tbl2.dest_address , tbl2.dest_axis_x , tbl2.dest_axis_y , tbl2.dest_information , tbl2.dest_season , tbl2.dest_feature , tbl2.dest_description , tbl2.dest_reg_datetime
FROM ( SELECT ta.dest_id, ta.reco_count FROM ( SELECT a.dest_id ,a.dest_recomm_point ,a.dest_clip_point ,(a.dest_recomm_point + a.dest_clip_point) AS reco_count FROM geo_destination a WHERE 1=1
a.dest_region = #destRegion#
a.dest_season LIKE CONCAT('%',#destSeason#,'%')
ORDER BY reco_count DESC ) ta WHERE reco_count > 0 ) tbl LEFT JOIN geo_destination tbl2 ON tbl.dest_id=tbl2.dest_id ORDER BY tbl.reco_count DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage#
